name: Bouncing Bush
description:
Hello! This is my very first ever game, Bouncing Bush.

You are a bush (Called Bushly) and you have to get to the end of the game to defeat lord crystal! He is summoning his evil minions like the Masked Orc and plenty of others around this peaceful world to bring evil to everything!

You move by clicking on Bushly, then you drag off him and you get a line. This line point where you aim Bushly and when you release your left click, He launches towards your mouse like a slingshot!

Supporters and very cool dudes list:

  • RoeeK, My friend, made absolutely stunning pixel art for The Lord Crystal!

The game is currently a demo so there is only 7 levels. The game is still in development!
